Utterance: Jesmin aaj kemon achho?
Thik achhe,
Thik achhe. Ki hochhe?
Ami eto beshi roger sathe mokabela korchi je amar dainandin jibone niyontro korte amar osubidha hochhe.
Onek roger. Hyan. Aponi amake kichu udahoron dite paren?
Jemon,

Ami drive cleaner er kache jai, amar bagdattar uniform pick up kore, ebong bhadromohila segulike bol bag er moto eksathe rekhechhilen ebong mane, ami sohojei take jiggasha korte partam karon se tader alada korechhe. Kintu ami chitkar korte shuru korlam ekta boro gondogol karon ami khub hotash ebong roganvit chhilam. Se ashle poliske dakhte jachchhilo amake ber kore anate. Ebong ami mone kori na je amake ar driveote firo jawaar anumoti deoya hoyeche.
Tai besh kichhu roger.

Hyan. Amar protibeshir kuro ghibir rate gheu gheu korchhilo. Ami amar protibeshider chini jokhon tara eti niontron korte pare na. Kintu ami amar protibeshider torker sathe prochondo jhogra kori. Amra ei momente kotha bolchi na ebong eti kewal aswastikor. Kintu, ami bolte chachchi, ami ekhon kharap bodh korchhi je eti kontir sathei ses hoini. Ami eta sompore chhinta. Ebong ami jani na keno ami eto bichalit je kuro kaj chhilo.
Thik. Sutontrai apnar drishtikon theke, keno tini eto roganvit holen ta bujha jay na.
Na, ami kichu somoyer jonno eti cholchhe. Akhon. Ami shudhu samanyo jinish pete shudhu ami bishphorito.
Tai ami jani na keno
Ami shuru korar somoy ki kichu poriborton hoyeche?
Ami jokhon obhibhuto hoi tokhon ami sottiye bhabhte pari na. Amar onek kichu korar ache. Ami shudhu bhenge pori ebong amar charpasher sobkichhu niye khub bhirto hoiye jai.
Thik achhe, tai apni bhirto hochhen apnar kichu roger ache
Onno kono somoy jokhon apni roganvit bodh korchhen

Jokhon ami kickboxing class-e go workout-e jai tokhon ami go all out-er moto thaki jemon ami etike release-er moto bhabhte pari. Goto shoptahe amar kobzite aghat kora-r age ami lojjartu bag ghushi dici. Ami shudhu shekhane sob out jai ebong amar proshikshok dhorno type notice apni thik achhen? Ebong ami mone kori eta shudhu trankoroner sob roger ongkito ami tai out hoye gechhi.
Thik achhe, apnar jonno oi obhijhota. Apni mone koren je game-er onnano lokera opokkhe kortey pare ta theke apni beshi shokti mukto korchen
Tumi onek beshi ami jore jore, ami bullet ghamchi. Ami khub roganvit moto sob out jachchi.
Thik achhe, tai
Sampratik smritite, apnar rogo bereseche, kintu eta akhono sposto noi je ki ghotche. Je rogo karon.
Aslei na ami shudhu hotash bodh korchhi ei momente onek kichu cholche. Tai eta shudhu obhibhuto bodh moto dhorno, ami eta ber na onumon.
Apni beshi bodh korchen, apnar dainandin jibone jemon onek dainyotar?
Hyan, onek kichhu
Ebong apni ki dhorno jinis korchen.
Prodhanot, prodhanot bari-er jotno neowar mane ei noi je ami kaj kori na ba kichu na. Tai ami kebal bari-er jotno ni ebong, apni janen, bachchader ebong sobkichhur sathe, eta onek kichu. Tai
Bari-te onek dainyota dekhun.
Somosto daiyitvo onumon korun.
Eta tader shob moto mone hoy? Hyan.
Aponi ki dhorno jinis korchen?
Ami ranna korchi, ami porishkar korchi.

Ekhon amake amar swamir somosto uniform uparjon korte hobe ebong tar jonno sobkichu prostut korte hobe. Amake nishchit korate hoyechilo je ami sokale nasta ranna korchi, amake nishchit korate hoyechilo je ami duporer khabar beche nichi. Amake nishchit korate hoyechilo je amar dinner ready income ache ja ami bachchader tader bari'r kaje sahayyo kortey chai. Ami shudhu eta dhruvok, catering, catering, catering, catering, cater ebong eta mone hoy ami sotyo ei ekta bivorti pete na ba onno kono sahayyo shudhu protidin kora hoyeche moto eto jachhe.
Aponi sobkichu korchen ebong sobshomoy evabe achen.
Sobshomoy noy, tobe mone hoy kichu somoyer jonno eti emon chhilo.
Thik ache. Jekhane aponi sotyo bari te sobkichu korchen.
Sobkichu.
Ami aponake jiggasha korte chai.

Ami ki aponake jiggasha korte pari ba koyekti shabd ullekh korte pari? Thik? Ami aponake chai, jodi aponi ei onushiloner sathe thik thaken, tahole protome jeta mone ase ta amake bolun ebong aponi ekta shabd kinte paren, aponi besh koyekti protikriya dite paren. Tobe apanar sathe ja ghotbe tar protikriyate onek chintabhabna na korar chesta korun. O, kintu je mane?
Hyan.
Thik ache. Tai protom shabd.
Gotthon, daiyitvo.
Punoravritti.
Punoravritti.
Thik ache. Aro ekta kotha boli, somporko.
Songrosh, kshomotar lorai.
Motbhed.
Ami aponake aro ekta shabd prosto kori
Kaj.
Swadhinota,
Swadhinota
Srijonshilota prokash korte shokkhom.
Bhalo, thik ache. Ekhane onno shabd somporke kivabe? Shakti
Abiram songram
Atanto niontrok.
Sutro, aponi kon dekhte pano?
Theme ebong shobde je aponi phire diyechen
Mone hoy shobkichu sotyo niyontroit mato ebong
Kathamobdho,
Niyontroto ebong kathamogoto?
Sei niyontrokari kathamo r utsho ki? Eta ekta utsho ache?
Eta onek amar bagdotta theke ashte pare. Ekhon ami eta niye vabchi.
Keu amake bolechilo tumi vabcho,

Karon ami mone kori je se amake onek kichu korer swadhinta ba shomotto dey na ja ami kajer moto korte chai, ebong ami mone kori tar bari'r ashepasher bachchader sathe aro beshi sahayyo kora uchit ebong kichu kora uchit amake shobkichu korte hobe na. Ebong ami mone kori sambhobota eita karon ami eto hatash karon ami onubhobho korechi je amar kono sahayyo nei. Eta mone hoy ami obibahito, ebong ami nijerai shobkichu korchhi. Sutro, ei prokolpoti jekhane amar hatasha boro onsho theke asche.
Aapni jokhon amake ei kotha bolchen ebong aapni apanar bagdottar sathe somporker bakhya korchen tokhon aapni ki anubhav korchen?
Ami raganvit ebong hotash bodh korchi. Jemon ami sotti janina ami aro kichu korte chai kina karon bhalo eti chirakale raganvit, hotasher motoi thakbe.
Aapni sompriti je rager sommukhin hoyechen tar anurup. Drai cleaner jagate jemon.
Eta etar cheye onek kharap kintu ami mone kori je ekhanei ami sobshomoy eto bhirto ebong raganvit thaki.
Guruttor chinta je sambhobat sei somporko ba sei somporker kichu onsho ja sotti rager karon.

Haan, karon ami eki somoye sampoorna eka bodh kori. Jemon ami noyyo somporker moddhe noi temoni ami niontorno ache ebong amar kichu korar swadhinta nei. Amar kon sahayyo nei ebong eto sudhu amar upor onek chap dichhe.
Tahole eta ki ei somporker apanar kotha apanar ki mone hoy eti eto notun tottho ja aapni aage bujhte parenni.

Eta karon sathe, ami kokhono ei diktiro dike monoyog deini. Ami dhorone je kivabe eta jete hobe. Ebong ami sudhu bhebechilam ami rago korechi karon ami kharap kajgulike ghrona kori. Ami sotti ei tar gheere khononi karon ami amar poribare sobkichu toiri korte onek chesta kori, thik. Tai ami dhoronei monoyog dite na, ami dhoronei eta upokkha. Kintu ekhon je ami bhabe ebong bhinno jinish nirdesh korchi, ami sotti kemon anubhav korchi tar cheye.
Tai aapni eta ki anubhav koren, sachetanotar khetre ei dhroner boro muhurto.

Spashtotai karon ami mone kori na je ami ja bolechi ta ami chai, ami mone kori ami etike lukanoar chesta korchi ebong sotti ei te besi focus kori na karon ami chai je jinisguli nikhoth hok. Tai tara etake ek dhore upokkha koreche.

Thik ache, daba chol. Ami mone kori ami ekhane kichu ogrothi korchi. Ebong ami chai aapni ekhon ebong poroborti session-er moddhe, aapni jodi eti sathhe sochchondho koren tobe kon themeguli prosthe ashbe, kon totthoguli aapnar kache kichu ta prokash kora hoyeche tar upor ekdhornoi protiphlon korun. Ebong amra sekhane bachai korte pari ebong rager bisoye eti aro anveshan korte pari. Sutara je ekta bhalo porikkhona moto.
Haan, oboshoi. Karon ami kono karon chharaei chole jai ebong thik pore bhabhte chai, keno ami emonto korlam?
Kintu nongorer ei utsho, ei somporko, aapni chinte parben eto karon ba aro beshi obodon? Haan. Aapnar bijnaponer onyanno bastu kothay? Aapni jodi sotti nei tahole,
Ami mutoi nishchit chhilam na. Keno. Kintu er sathe, ami oboshhoi karon guli dekhte partam.

Thik ache, daba chol. Ami mone kori ami ekhane kichu progoti korchi. Ebong ami chai aapni ekhon ebong poroborti session-er moddhe, aapni jodi eti sathhe sochchondho koren tobe kon themeguli prosthe ashbe, kon totthoguli aapnar kache kichu ta prokash kora hoyeche tar upor ekdhornoi protiphlon korun. Ebong amra sekhane bachai korte pari ebong rager bisoye eti aro anveshan korte pari. Sutara je ekta bhalo porikkhona moto.
Haan, oboshhoi. Spashtbhabe. Eta bhalo.
Aachha, ami ajke aapnar asar proshansa kori, ebong ami aapnake shoptahe dekhte pabo. Thik ache. Dhonnobad.
